job_description.summary: Responsible for developing and maintaining web-based applications for banking services.

Responsible for developing and maintaining web-based applications for healthcare, such as patient registration, electronic medical records (EMR), appointment scheduling, and other hospital management systems.
details: Led frontend development projects, planning, design, coding, testing for Clinic Health.
Designed and implemented new features for the internal SIMRS web application.
Collaborated with software engineers to troubleshoot and resolve development issues.
Work closely with a System Analyst for immediate bugs/issues resolution.
Research and evaluation of new technologies that may improve our processes or code bases.

job_description.summary: Responsible for developing user-friendly web interfaces for job seekers, employee, and administrators. Focusing on performance, usability, and ensuring mobile responsiveness
details: Contributed successful mobile-responsive for dashboard employer, increase user experience up to 50%.
Collaborate with UI teams to implement design and integration with backend functionalities.
Improving web performance, including code optimization and image compression best practices.
Work closely with QA for immediate bugs/issues resolution.

job_description.summary: Responsible for building and maintaining, responsive web applications for healthcare services like appointment booking and health content platforms.
details: Success revamp the UI/UX for the booking doctor process, resulting 40% increase in user engagement.
Collaborate with Head of Engineering to improve web performance and loading speeds up to 30%.
Implemented A/B tests on web, resulting in higher conversion rates and better user engagement.
Developed and maintained responsive web, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and performance.
Work closely with QA and Product Manager for immediate bugs/issues resolution.

job_description.summary: Responsible for building and optimizing user interfaces that enhance the buying and selling experience for businesses. Ensuring seamless navigation, efficient product search, and secure transaction handling on the platform
details: Success revamp the UI/UX for the booking doctor process, resulting 40% increase in user engagement.
Collaborate with Head of Engineering to improve web performance and loading speeds up to 30%.
Implemented A/B tests on web, resulting in higher conversion rates and better user engagement.
Developed and maintained responsive web, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and performance.
Work closely with QA and Product Manager for immediate bugs/issues resolution.
